mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.SPECIALITY_NAME, CASE WHEN(SUBSTR(EMP_ID_PK, 1, 1) = 'D') THEN '의사' WHEN(SUBSTR(EMP_ID_PK, 1, 1) = 'I') THEN '외래간호사' WHEN(SUBSTR(EMP_ID_PK, 1, 1) = 'O') THEN '병동간호사' WHEN(SUBSTR(EMP_ID_PK, 1, 1) = 'R') THEN '원무' END AS JOB_NAME FROM EMP_INFO_TB AS a LEFT JOIN SPECIALITY_TB AS b ON a.SPECIALITY_ID_FK = b.SPECIALITY_ID_PK WHERE EMP_ID_PK = #{pk};

SELECT a.EMP_NAME, b.SPECIALITY_NAME, SUBSTR(NOW(), 1, 10) AS WORKING_DATE, CASE WHEN(WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 0) THEN '월' WHEN(WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 1) THEN '화' WHEN(WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 2) THEN '수' WHEN(WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 3) THEN '목' WHEN(WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 4) THEN '금' WHEN(WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 5) THEN '토' WHEN(WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 6) THEN '일' END AS WORKING_DAY, CASE WHEN(SUBSTR(EMP_ID_PK, 1, 1) = 'D') THEN '외래 진료' WHEN(SUBSTR(EMP_ID_PK, 1, 1) = 'I') THEN '외래 환자 치료' WHEN(SUBSTR(EMP_ID_PK, 1, 1) = 'O') THEN '병동 관리' WHEN(SUBSTR(EMP_ID_PK, 1, 1) = 'R') THEN '환자 접수 및 수납' END AS WORK FROM EMP_INFO_TB AS a LEFT JOIN SPECIALITY_TB AS b ON a.SPECIALITY_ID_FK = b.SPECIALITY_ID_PK WHERE EMP_ID_PK = #{pk};
